message_thread.content:
1. Based on the extracted data from {'Course Information': {'Course Title': 'Hands-on AI-Assisted Programming Made Simple with GitHub Copilot', 'Name of Organisation': 'Tertiary Infotech Pte Ltd', 'Classroom Hours': 3, 'Practical Hours': 4, 'Number of Assessment Hours': 1, 'Course Duration (Number of Hours)': 8, 'Industry': 'Infocomm Technology'}, 'Learning Outcomes': {'Learning Outcomes': ['LO1: Identify gaps in existing programming workflows and propose AI-assisted solutions using GitHub Copilot to enhance efficiency.', 'LO2: Explore and apply emerging AI programming tools, including GitHub Copilot, to streamline organizational coding processes.'], 'Knowledge': ['K1: Relevant systems and software', "K2: Organisation's processes", 'K3: Strengths and weaknesses of existing software and systems', 'K4: Emerging technological trends such as block chain, machine learning, artificial intelligence,'], 'Ability': ['A1: Identify issues in the existing software and systems', 'A2: Seek potential IT solutions to resolve issues or for systems upgrading', 'A3: Propose to management on suitable IT solutions for the organisation', 'A4: Keep up to date with new technologies and systems'], 'Knowledge and Ability Mapping': {'KA1': ['K1', 'K3', 'A1', 'A3'], 'KA2': ['K2', 'K4', 'A2', 'A4']}}, 'TSC and Topics': {'TSC Title': ['Digital Technology Adoption and Innovation'], 'TSC Code': ['ACC-ICT-3004-1.1'], 'Topics': ['Topic 1: Getting Started  with Github Copilot (K1, K3, A1, A3)', 'Topic 2: Software Development with Github Copilot (K2, K4, A2, A4)'], 'Learning Units': ['LU1: Introduction to Copilot', 'LU2: Coding with Github Copilot']}, 'Assessment Methods': {'Assessment Methods': ['Written Assessment', 'Practical Performance'], 'Amount of Practice Hours': '4 hrs', 'Course Outline': {'Learning Units': {'LU1: Introduction to Copilot (K1, K3, A1, A3)': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 1: Getting Started  with Github Copilot (K1, K3, A1, A3)', 'Details': ['What is Github Copilot?', 'How Github Copilot enhances software development efficiency?', 'Install Github Copilot on Visual Studio Code', 'Explore Github Copilot features']}]}, 'LU2: Coding with Github Copilot (K2, K4, A2, A4)': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 2: Software Development with Github Copilot (K2, K4, A2, A4)', 'Details': ['Github Copilot for HTML', 'Github Copilot for Python', 'Github Copilot for Javascript', 'Github Copilot for REST API', 'Other emerging AI tools for software development']}]}}}, 'Instructional Methods': ['Classroom: 3 hrs', 'Didactic Questioning', 'Demonstration', 'Practical: 4 hrs']}}, generate your justifications.
    2. Ensure your responses are structured in JSON format.
    3. Return a full JSON object with all your answers according to the schema.
